long_description: You can use the Bison Designs Capsule Keychain in size small for hiding geocaching clues or treasures, or for carrying pills or even a love note from your sweetie. Made of sturdy aluminum; screws tightly closed. Key ring makes it easy to carry keys or attach the capsule to a backpack.
